search_results.snippet:
So, I was appointed to make the "group report" to the aliens of our human 
experience of ..... thin pieces of paper and plastic that somehow cement my 
identity in the 21st century. .... The word 'animal' is derived from the Latin anima, 
which is defined as soul. ...... Because the kids were too blown-away-gone, juice 
in the veins,
search_results.title: Journaling the Infinite - ( bird on the moon ) ~ emerging

question: (Cheryl of the Clue Crew reports from a lab at the University of Mississippi.)  Sound waves are used to heat and seal blood vessels in a 21st century version of this process from the Latin for "branding iron"
